title: The kid loves her phone. She wanted the 11 but loves the 7.
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: This is what my grand daughter wanted for her birthday. Grandma made it happen. She wanted an Iphone, so she could FaceTime me, and to keep up with the latest games and things like her cousins. She’s a happy kid right now. Of rage loves the touch screen, and her battery doesn’t run down fast.
author: Andrettia Thompson
Split_4: She’s a happy kid right now.
Split_3: She wanted an Iphone, so she could FaceTime me, and to keep up with the latest games and things like her cousins.
Split_1: This is what my grand daughter wanted for her birthday.
